META.META_DESCRIPTION: Singapore’s 1st Bionic Financial Adviser where human wisdom and technology come together to deliver best-in-class financial advice that integrates national schemes.
META.META_KEYWORDS: 1st Bionic Financial Adviser, Financial Adviser, Singapore Financial Adviser

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who We Are
WHO_WE_ARE.MESSAGE:
MoneyOwl is a financial adviser and fund management company licensed by the MAS. We aim to empower you to live life to the full by helping you make wise money decisions easily and confidently.

We are Singapore’s 1st Bionic Financial Adviser! To be Bionic means to have the best of both worlds – humans and technology. Technology integrates complex financial models into your financial plan with ease and precision. But we understand that money is very personal and involves emotions, aspirations and life decisions. That’s why both our dedicated client advisers and our technology platforms come together to journey with you in every stage of your life.

We provide a one-stop service platform that is everything you need to develop a fit-for-purpose financial plan. Incorporating national schemes such as CPF, we provide comprehensive, competent and conflict-free financial advice and fund management services in support of your plan.

MoneyOwl is a social enterprise and a joint venture between NTUC Enterprise Co-operative Limited and Providend Holding Private Limited. We exist to serve you!

MGT.NAME: Chuin Ting WEBER, CFA, CAIA
MGT.TITLE: Chief Executive Officer / Chief Investment Officer
MGT.CV:
Chuin Ting Weber has over twenty years of professional experience spanning the public, social and financial sectors. She was Chief Investment and Asset Management Officer of the Singapore Labour Foundation, a government statutory board. Prior to that, Chuin Ting was Senior Vice President at NTUC Enterprise Co-operative Ltd in which role she oversaw strategic capital management projects and the group’s financial services cluster. She had been an investment professional at Lion Global Investors Ltd, working in various roles in fixed income, macro strategy, asset allocation and multi-asset fund management. Chuin Ting had also served the Singapore Ministry of Defence covering international defence relations and strategic affairs, including as Deputy Director of Defence Policy.

Chuin Ting holds Masters of Arts and Bachelor of Arts (Honours) degrees in Modern History from Oxford University, a Bachelor of Arts in Chinese Language and Culture from the Beijing Language and Culture University and the Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) and Chartered Alternative Investment Analyst (CAIA) designations.

MGT.NAME: Christopher TAN, CFP®
MGT.TITLE: Executive Director
MGT.CV:
Christopher Tan has more than two decades of experience in the financial advisory industry. As Executive Director, he provides expert consultancy to MoneyOwl across the areas of financial advisory, business development, financial literacy programmes, public education and adviser training. Christopher was a member of the CPF Advisory Panel from 2014 to 2016 and part of the Management Committee of Securities Investors Association Singapore (SIAS) from 2009 to 2017. Christopher contributes regularly to and is often quoted in the local press for his expert opinion on financial matters. He is also an internationally sought-after speaker and trainer. Christopher is Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Providend Ltd, Singapore’s first fee-only financial adviser.

Christopher has a Bachelor of Financial Services (Honours) Degree from the National University of Ireland and a Master of Business Administration Degree from University of Warwick. He is a Certified Financial Planner (CFP) and a member of the Financial Planning Association of Singapore.

MGT.NAME: Eddy CHEONG, CFP®
MGT.TITLE: Chief Advisory Officer
MGT.CV:
Eddy Cheong has close to twenty years of experience in the financial planning industry. As Chief Advisory Officer, he is responsible for the delivery of MoneyOwl’s bionic financial advisory service through both the Client Advisory Team and MoneyOwl’s multiple roboadvisory platforms. In addition, he leads the Solution Team in formulating financial planning solutions and spearheads the development of MoneyOwl’s financial planning thought leadership capability. Prior to joining MoneyOwl, Eddy was Head of DIYInsurance and Executive Director of Providend Ltd. He was also the key architect of RetireWell®, Providend’s proprietary retirement income planning system. Eddy co-authored the “Singapore Master Financial Planning Guide” and co-led a project to pioneer an online retirement calculation tool on the CPF website.

Eddy has a Bachelor of Accountancy degree from Nanyang Technological University. He is a Certified Financial Planner (CFP) and a member of the Financial Planning Association of Singapore.

MGT.NAME: Alan CHIU
MGT.TITLE: Chief Technology Officer
MGT.CV:
Alan Chiu is a senior technology and business leader with extensive strategic leadership, technology business innovation and growth experience at high-profile start-ups and public listed multi-nationals in Silicon Valley and Asia. More recently, he has been Chief Technology Officer and Chief Information Officer at NTUC Link Pte Ltd, serving a key role as a digital transformation leader and building technology teams to deliver data-driven software products and technology services to social enterprises across the NTUC Group as well as external business partners. Prior to NTUC Link, Alan was Chief Technology Officer at MatchMove Pay, an award-winning Fintech start-up; and Senior Business Leader at Visa Worldwide, leading various global technology teams.

Alan graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Information Systems and Computer Science from the National University of Singapore. He was a recipient of the ASEAN scholarship awarded by the Singapore Ministry of Education.

MGT.NAME: Harry CH’NG, CA, CFA
MGT.TITLE: Chief Financial Officer/ Senior Vice President, Investment
MGT.CV: Harry Ch’ng has almost twenty years of experience across multiple finance disciplines including financial accounting, financial planning and analysis tax, transfer pricing, treasury and business partnering. As the Chief Financial Officer & Senior Vice President, Investments, Harry is responsible for the finance, investment, human resource and administration functions in MoneyOwl. Harry started his career in Arthur Andersen before moving on to leadership positions in finance and treasury functions across diverse industries. More recently, he was Senior Vice President, Finance and Corporate Services at NTUC Link Pte Ltd. Prior to that, he was the Head of Finance for Asia at Unity Technologies, a global leader in game engine and developer services, and also spent time as the Global Treasury Director at Dystar, a solutions provider for textile colorants and auxiliary chemicals. Harry has a Bachelor of Accountancy (Honours) degree from Nanyang Technological University. He holds the Chartered Accountant (CA) and Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) designations.

MGT.NAME: Justin TAN, FLMI, IBFA
MGT.TITLE: Head, Compliance
MGT.CV:
Justin Tan has more than ten years of experience in compliance and risk management. He started his career in the life insurance industry and has been in the financial advisory industry for the past decade. Justin believes that every company should build and grow its business centred on a strong ethical core. He was a developer of courses on ethics and rules and regulations accredited by the Singapore College of Insurance.

Justin has a Bachelor of Science degree in Business from the University of London. He holds a Diploma in Compliance from the International Compliance Association. He is also a Fellow of the Life Management Institute (FLMI).

GENERAL.TITLE: Customer Reviews
GENERAL.SUB_TITLE: Hear what our clients say about us

META.META_DESCRIPTION: Singapore’s 1st Bionic Financial Adviser where human wisdom and technology come together to deliver best-in-class financial advice that integrates national schemes.
META.META_KEYWORDS: 1st Bionic Financial Adviser, Financial Adviser, Singapore Financial Adviser

HEADER.TITLE: Why MoneyOwl
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: We provide financial advice that is comprehensive, competent and conflict-free, using solutions that are fit-for-purpose so that you can be empowered to live a fulfilling life.

VALUE_PROP.LABEL: MAS-licensed
VALUE_PROP.DESCRIPTION: MoneyOwl is a financial adviser and fund management company licensed by the MAS. Inheriting our DNA to Do Good and Do Right from our two corporate parents, NTUC Enterprise and Providend, we hold ourselves to the highest of standards to put your interests first. The key leaders of MoneyOwl have a wealth of experience in comprehensive financial planning and fund management so you can be assured of receiving the most competent advice.

VALUE_PROP.LABEL: High-tech + Human wisdom
VALUE_PROP.DESCRIPTION: Statistical models are static. Human relationships are dynamic. So, while robots can do precise calculations, only humans can understand your emotions and aspirations which must be considered in making money decisions. Have the best of both worlds. Leverage MoneyOwl’s advanced technology and receive advice from our dedicated Client Advisers. This is what we mean by Bionic – integrating technology with human wisdom to help you achieve your goals.

VALUE_PROP.LABEL: Non commissioned-based Advisers
VALUE_PROP.DESCRIPTION: We want to provide you with advice that is conflict-free. MoneyOwl’s advisers are salaried-based and are not remunerated by commissions. There is no incentive to hard-sell or to promote products that reward with higher commissions. Our focus is on helping you make wise money decisions in your best interests.

VALUE_PROP.LABEL: Integration with National Schemes
VALUE_PROP.DESCRIPTION: National schemes like our CPF are often ignored when it comes to financial planning in Singapore. Despite CPF playing such a large role in retirement planning, there is insufficient understanding of the scheme and an absence of advice in this key area. Integrating our advice with national schemes, you can now consolidate all your financial information, craft a comprehensive financial plan and achieve a more secure retirement.

VALUE_PROP.LABEL: Secure Platform
VALUE_PROP.DESCRIPTION: Your privacy is our priority. We do not sell or refer your personal information to a third party. MoneyOwl’s platform is built by an experienced technology team led by our very own Chief Technology Officer, undergoes rigorous penetration testing and meets technology risk management guidelines by MAS to ensure highest security and data protection, so that you can have peace of mind.

META.META_DESCRIPTION: Reach out to us if you have any enquiries
META.META_KEYWORDS: 1st Bionic Financial Adviser, Financial Adviser, Singapore Financial Adviser

GENERAL.TITLE: Contact Us
GENERAL.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to contact us if you have any comments or questions. We are happy to learn about your experience and offer our assistance. Your privacy is our priority and all information shared will be kept confidential.
